----------------------------------------------- -- This urls works white v1 of sarshomar api -- ----------------------------------------------- --------- https://sarshomar.com/api/v1 -------- ----------------------------------------------- GET /poll POST /poll PUT /poll DELETE /poll/[code] GET /poll/ask GET /poll/random GET /poll/answer POST /poll/answer PUT /poll/answer DELETE /poll/answer GET /poll/comment POST /poll/comment PUT /poll/comment DELETE /poll/comment GET /poll/comment/vote POST /poll/comment/vote PUT /poll/comment/vote DELETE /poll/comment/vote POST /poll/fav DELETE /poll/fav POST /poll/like DELETE /poll/like POST /poll/rank PUT /poll/rank DELETE /poll/rank GET /poll/price POST /poll/report GET /poll/search GET /billing/balance GET /file POST /file GET /tag/search GET /tag POST /tag GET /token/temp GET /token/guest GET /token/login
